constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 106 (Thursday, June 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. HICE of Georgia:
H.R. 3998.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Actricle 1, Section 8, Clause 3 of the Constitution states
that Congress shall have the Power ``To regulate Commerce
with foreign Nations, and among the several States . . .''
[Page H2929]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Fairness in Firearm Testing Act
